Bash("C:\Users\maximiliano.c\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''scum_main.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

# Verificar tablas crÃ­ticas del Admin Panel
required_tables = [
    ''admin_fame_rewards'',
    ''admin_banking_account_types'', 
    ''admin_taxi_vehicles'',
    ''admin_mechanic_services'',
    ''admin_users'',
    ''admin_roles'',
    ''admin_permissions'',
    ''user_fame_points'',
    ''user_bank_accounts'',
    ''taxi_rides'',
    ''mechanic_service_requests''
]

print(''=== VERIFICACION DE CONSISTENCIA ==='')
print(''Tablas requeridas por Admin Panel:'')
missing_tables = []
for table in required_tables:
    cursor.execute(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table"" AND name=?'', (table,))
    exists = cursor.fetchone() is not None
    status = ''[OK]'' if exists else ''[MISSING]''
    print(f''   {status} {table}'')
    if not exists:
        missing_tables.append(table)

print(f''\n[RESUMEN] {len(required_tables) - len(missing_tables)}/{len(required_tables)} tablas encontradas'')
if missing_tables:
    print(f''[WARNING] Tablas faltantes: {missing_tables}'')
else:
    print(''[SUCCESS] Todas las tablas requeridas existen'')

conn.close()
")

import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''C:/Users/maximiliano.c/Documents/ScumBunkerTimer/scum_main.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

# Buscar tablas relacionadas con welcome, channels, reset, notifications
search_terms = [''welcome'', ''channel'', ''reset'', ''notification'', ''config'', ''server'']
relevant_tables = []

cursor.execute(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table"" ORDER BY name'')
all_tables = [t[0] for t in cursor.fetchall()]

for table in all_tables:
    for term in search_terms:
        if term in table.lower():
            relevant_tables.append(table)
            break

print(''=== TABLAS DE CONFIGURACIÃ“N RELEVANTES ==='')
for table in set(relevant_tables):  # Remove duplicates
    print(f''  âœ… {table}'')
    
print(f''\n=== VERIFICANDO CONTENIDO DE TABLAS CLAVE ==='')

# Verificar notification_configs
print(''\nðŸ“¢ NOTIFICATION_CONFIGS:'')
try:
    cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM notification_configs LIMIT 3'')
    rows = cursor.fetchall()
    cursor.execute(''PRAGMA table_info(notification_configs)'')
    columns = [col[1] for col in cursor.fetchall()]
    print(f''   Columnas: {columns}'')
    print(f''   Registros: {len(rows)}'')
    if rows:
        for row in rows[:2]:
            print(f''   Ejemplo: {row}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''   Error: {e}'')

# Verificar servers  
print(''\nðŸ–¥ï¸ SERVERS:'')
try:
    cursor.execute(''SELECT * FROM servers LIMIT 3'')
    rows = cursor.fetchall()
    cursor.execute(''PRAGMA table_info(servers)'')
    columns = [col[1] for col in cursor.fetchall()]
    print(f''   Columnas: {columns}'')
    print(f''   Registros: {len(rows)}'')
    if rows:
        for row in rows[:2]:
            print(f''   Ejemplo: {row}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''   Error: {e}'')

conn.close()
")

import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''C:/Users/maximiliano.c/Documents/ScumBunkerTimer/scum_main.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

print(''=== TABLAS DE CONFIGURACION RELEVANTES ==='')

# Tablas que contienen configuraciones
config_tables = [
    ''notification_configs'',
    ''servers'', 
    ''monitored_servers'',
    ''admin_banking_channels'',
    ''admin_bunker_config'',
    ''admin_taxi_config'',
    ''admin_mechanic_config''
]

for table in config_tables:
    try:
        cursor.execute(f''PRAGMA table_info({table})'')
        columns = [col[1] for col in cursor.fetchall()]
        cursor.execute(f''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table}'')
        count = cursor.fetchone()[0]
        print(f''{table}:'')
        print(f''   Columnas: {columns}'')
        print(f''   Registros: {count}'')
        print()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''{table}: No existe o error - {e}'')
        print()

conn.close()
")

import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''C:/Users/maximiliano.c/Documents/ScumBunkerTimer/scum_main.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

print(''=== VERIFICANDO SISTEMA DE BIENVENIDA ==='')
# Buscar tablas relacionadas con welcome/bienvenida
cursor.execute(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table"" AND (name LIKE ""%welcome%"" OR name LIKE ""%bienvenida%"" OR name LIKE ""%banking%"" OR name LIKE ""%channel%"") ORDER BY name'')
welcome_tables = cursor.fetchall()

for table in welcome_tables:
    print(f''Tabla encontrada: {table[0]}'')
    try:
        cursor.execute(f''PRAGMA table_info({table[0]})'')
        columns = cursor.fetchall()
        print(f''  Columnas: {[col[1] for col in columns]}'')
        cursor.execute(f''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table[0]}'')
        count = cursor.fetchone()[0]
        print(f''  Registros: {count}'')
        if count > 0:
            cursor.execute(f''SELECT * FROM {table[0]} LIMIT 2'')
            rows = cursor.fetchall()
            for row in rows:
                print(f''  Ejemplo: {row}'')
        print()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''  Error: {e}'')

conn.close()
")

Bash("C:\Users\maximiliano.c\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''C:/Users/maximiliano.c/Documents/ScumBunkerTimer/scum_main.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

print(''=== CONFIGURACION DE CANALES DISCORD ==='')
# Buscar todas las tablas que contengan configuraciÃ³n de canales
cursor.execute(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table"" AND (name LIKE ""%channel%"" OR name LIKE ""%config%"" OR name LIKE ""%notification%"") ORDER BY name'')
channel_tables = cursor.fetchall()

for table in channel_tables:
    print(f''\nTABLA: {table[0]}'')
    try:
        cursor.execute(f''PRAGMA table_info({table[0]})'')
        columns = cursor.fetchall()
        channel_columns = [col for col in columns if ''channel'' in col[1].lower() or ''id'' in col[1].lower()]
        
        if channel_columns:
            print(f''   Columnas relacionadas con canales: {[col[1] for col in channel_columns]}'')
            cursor.execute(f''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table[0]}'')
            count = cursor.fetchone()[0]
            print(f''   Registros: {count}'')
            
            if count > 0:
                cursor.execute(f''SELECT * FROM {table[0]} LIMIT 3'')
                rows = cursor.fetchall()
                for i, row in enumerate(rows):
                    # Solo mostrar primeros 5 campos para evitar problemas de encoding
                    limited_row = row[:5] if len(row) > 5 else row
                    print(f''   Registro {i+1}: {limited_row}...'')
        print()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''   Error: {e}'')

conn.close()
")

Bash("C:\Users\maximiliano.c\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''C:/Users/maximiliano.c/Documents/ScumBunkerTimer/scum_main.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

print(''=== SISTEMA DE ALERTAS DE REINICIO ==='')
# Buscar tablas relacionadas con reset, schedule, alert
cursor.execute(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table"" AND (name LIKE ""%reset%"" OR name LIKE ""%schedule%"" OR name LIKE ""%alert%"" OR name LIKE ""%server%"" OR name LIKE ""%monitored%"") ORDER BY name'')
reset_tables = cursor.fetchall()

for table in reset_tables:
    print(f''\nTABLA: {table[0]}'')
    try:
        cursor.execute(f''PRAGMA table_info({table[0]})'')
        columns = cursor.fetchall()
        print(f''   Columnas: {[col[1] for col in columns]}'')
        cursor.execute(f''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table[0]}'')
        count = cursor.fetchone()[0]
        print(f''   Registros: {count}'')
        
        if count > 0:
            cursor.execute(f''SELECT * FROM {table[0]} LIMIT 2'')
            rows = cursor.fetchall()
            for i, row in enumerate(rows):
                # Mostrar solo algunos campos para evitar problemas de encoding
                limited_row = str(row)[:100] + ''...'' if len(str(row)) > 100 else str(row)
                print(f''   Ejemplo {i+1}: {limited_row}'')
        print()
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''   Error: {e}'')

conn.close()
")

Bash("C:\Users\maximiliano.c\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\python.exe" -c "
import requests
import json

print(''=== TESTING SUPER ADMIN MODULE ==='')

# Test Super Admin Health Check
print(''\n1. Health Check:'')
try:
    response = requests.get(''http://localhost:8000/api/v1/superadmin/health'')
    print(f''   Status: {response.status_code}'')
    if response.status_code == 200:
        print(f''   Response: {response.json()}'')
    else:
        print(f''   Error: {response.text}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''   Connection Error: {e}'')

# Test Global Dashboard
print(''\n2. Global Dashboard:'')
try:
    response = requests.get(''http://localhost:8000/api/v1/superadmin/dashboard'')
    print(f''   Status: {response.status_code}'')
    if response.status_code == 200:
        data = response.json()
        print(f''   Total Servers: {data[""analytics""][""total_servers""]}'')
        print(f''   Monthly Revenue: $data[\""analytics\""][\""monthly_revenue\""]'')
        print(f''   System Health: {data[""analytics""][""system_health""][""overall_uptime""]}% uptime'')
        print(f''   Alerts: {len(data[""alerts""])} active'')
    else:
        print(f''   Error: {response.text}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''   Connection Error: {e}'')

# Test Servers Management  
print(''\n3. Servers Management:'')
try:
    response = requests.get(''http://localhost:8000/api/v1/superadmin/servers'')
    print(f''   Status: {response.status_code}'')
    if response.status_code == 200:
        data = response.json()
        print(f''   Total Servers Found: {data[""total_count""]}'')
        print(f''   Free Servers: {data[""subscription_summary""][""free""]}'')
        print(f''   Premium Servers: {data[""subscription_summary""][""premium""]}'')
        print(f''   VIP Servers: {data[""subscription_summary""][""vip""]}'')
        if data[""servers""]:
            print(f''   First Server: {data[""servers""][0][""guild_name""]} ({data[""servers""][0][""subscription_plan""]})'')
    else:
        print(f''   Error: {response.text}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''   Connection Error: {e}'')

# Test Subscription Management
print(''\n4. Subscription Management:'')
try:
    response = requests.get(''http://localhost:8000/api/v1/superadmin/subscriptions'')
    print(f''   Status: {response.status_code}'')
    if response.status_code == 200:
        data = response.json()
        print(f''   Monthly Recurring Revenue: $data[\""revenue_summary\""][\""monthly_recurring\""]'')
        print(f''   Active Subscriptions: {len(data[""active_subscriptions""])}'')
        print(f''   Annual Projection: $data[\""revenue_summary\""][\""annual_projection\""]'')
    else:
        print(f''   Error: {response.text}'')
except Exception as e:
    print(f''   Connection Error: {e}'')

print(''\n=== SUPER ADMIN MODULE TEST COMPLETED ==='')
")
